name: Tales of the Eligan - Free-to-play TCG
name_original: Tales of the Eligan - Free-to-play TCG
description:
Welcome to the Eligan ! A land full of stories and myths ! You may stay here as long as you like, but expect weird people to come out and challenge you at any moment... 

Not scared ? Fine, grab a deck and join the battle then ! May the Eligan Gods be on your side !
